archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Digitaal toetssysteem
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Een systeem dat het toetsen van deelnemers ondersteunt.

properties.value: Questionmark Perception (https://www.questionmark.com/us/perception/Pages/default.aspx), Teelen Testvision (http://www.testvision.nl), MapleTA (http://www.maplesoft.com/products/testing_solutions/), Respondus (http://www.respondus.com), N@Tschool! / N@Tsmartest (http://www.threeships.nl), KioWare (http://www.kioware.com), Achievement Series Acuity (http://www.scantron.com/achievementseries/), Statlab (http://www.win.tue.nl/statlab/)
